thread.title: Emma Watson, Bradley Cooper applaud Jennifer Lawrence's letter on pay inequality
thread.title_full: Emma Watson, Bradley Cooper applaud Jennifer Lawrence's letter on pay inequality - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Emma Watson, Bradley Cooper applaud Jennifer Lawrence's letter on pay inequality
text:
*Los Angeles:* Oscar-winning actress Jennifer Lawrence's essay criticising the gender pay gap in Hollywood has been applauded by several actors including Emma Watson, Elizabeth Banks and her "American Hustle" co-star Bradley Cooper.
*Bradley Cooper and Jennifer Lawrence. Pic/Santa Banta*
Lawrence, 25, has finally opened up ... Â»
